sentence.Network_en: They only survive in unplowed rice fields where no irrigation is given.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们只能在未耕、无灌水的稻田中生存.

sentence.Network_en: It is the star that is not reached and the harvest sleeping in the unplowed ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是无法触及的星辰,是沉睡在尚未耕作的土地下的收获.

PerfectNetExp.abs: They only survive in unplowed rice fields where no irrigation is given ., 它们只能在未耕 , 无灌水的稻田中生存.
